reviews.comment: Amazing selection of filaments and great customer service! Highly recommend.
Fast shipping and reliable printers. However, the packaging could be better.
The resin I bought was top-quality. My prints have never looked better!
Decent pricing, but customer support took too long to respond to my issue.
Love their custom parts service. I got exactly what I needed for my project.
High-quality filament, but the website navigation could be improved.
Excellent product range and competitive prices. Will shop again soon!
Disappointed with the printer I received. It had missing parts.
Great selection, but shipping costs are a bit high for international orders.
The tutorials on their site helped me fix my printer. Fantastic resource!
My filament order arrived quickly and prints perfectly. Great experience!
The quality control could be better. I received a defective nozzle.
Responsive customer service, but shipping was slower than expected.
Amazing quality products and very user-friendly site. Highly satisfied!
Good pricing on bundles, but the tracking system needs improvement.
